Mr. Graydon Ausmus
Station WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
Life continues to be hectic, lively and interesting,
on account of our Symphony project and network planning.
It will clearly be impossible for me to get to the
Waldorf Astoria meeting this coming week. However, I
will definitely be in New York for the committee meeting
on January 27 and 28.
Let me know where it will be and whether I should
/ make my own hotel reservations or if someone else will
make them for me.
When I see you I can give you the saga on telecast¬
ing th# ninety piece symphony orchestra with all the
trappings; and a kinescope or two as evidence
of results achieved'.
So long until next week.
Yours sincerely,
(W
Burton Paulu
